channel.title: netmiko on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in netmiko on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Execute commands by automatically detecting the type of network device with netmiko
item.description: What is #netmiko netmiko is a Python library that helps you login and operate network devices with SSH. Currently, it supports Cisco IOS, Juniper JunOS, Palo Alto PAN-OS, etc. Login, configuration mode transition, logout, etc. are abstracted as methods, and each command is a type of library that directly specifies a command. This is less abstract than NAPALM. It can be installed with pip intall netmiko etc. GitHub repository ktbyers/netmiko: Multi-vendor library to simplify Paramiko SSH connections to network devices
